I have posted the requested pictures.  Hope they help.  I also did as a fri=
end of mine at work suggested and performed a rubbing on the tang.  The cha=
racter that looked like a Y now looks like a Y with a "n" attached to the b=
ottom right side.  I tried to draw it in Power Point - I think I captured t=
he gist of it, but the arms of the Y aren't crooked like my left side is.  =
I think I've seen this character before.  Later if I have time, I'll try an=
d scan the rubbing so you can see what I actually see, but for now I have t=
o run.
   
  Becky
